lead_paragraph: Speeding between the Masters and his next tournament cost José María Olazábal $621 when a Georgia sheriff’s deputy pulled him over for driving 97 miles per hour on a rural highway in Springfield, Ga.
snippet: Speeding between the Masters and his next tournament cost José María Olazábal $621 when a Georgia sheriff’s deputy pulled him over for driving 97 miles per hour on a rural highway in Springfield, Ga.
